Activity: Arrive, make tea (Ginger Peach today!). Review overnight tickets and emails.
Follow up with @ehrv-1 regarding the data export bug report from yesterday. Inquire about the estimated timeframe for a fix and if any temporary workarounds are available.
Address a new ticket from @rn-3 reporting an issue with printing patient summaries from the EHR. Troubleshoot the issue by first attempting to print a patient summary on a test system.

Discover that the printing issue is related to a recent update to the EHR's printing module. The update has introduced a bug that causes the print preview to display incorrectly and the printed output to be garbled.
Escalate the printing bug to senior IT staff and @ehrv-1. Inform them of the issue and provide details about the affected module and the observed symptoms. @PEOPLE
While waiting for a response, begin working on another ticket from @his-2 reporting issues with data validation rules in a specific EHR form.

Investigate the data validation rules in the specified EHR form. Discover that the rules are not functioning as expected, allowing users to enter invalid data. Email @clinlead-1 to confirm if the rule is correct or not. @PEOPLE

After receiving confirmation from @clinlead-1 that the data validation rules are incorrect, work with @ehrdev-1 to modify the rules in the EHR system. Implement the necessary changes and test thoroughly to ensure they function as expected.
Lunch Break. Catch up on some news articles about social justice issues.

Receive a response from @ehrv-1 regarding the printing bug. They acknowledge the issue and are working on a fix. A temporary workaround is provided: exporting the patient summary to PDF and then printing the PDF file. Communicate the workaround to @rn-3 and update the ticketing system.
Monitor the ticketing system and address new incoming tickets.
A user, @mrs-2, is reporting issues with accessing archived patient records. Research the archive process and common access problems.
Discover that the user's account does not have the necessary permissions to access archived records. Escalate the issue to @itpm-1 to adjust the permissions. @PEOPLE
Confirm that the user can now access the archived records. Document the solution in the knowledge base. Update the ticketing system and close the ticket.
Continue working on the knowledge base article, focusing on data validation rule issues and printing problems.
Check emails one last time. Prepare for the next day's tasks.
